txt_en: Courage is doing what you're afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you're scared.
txt_cn: 行畏惧之事可谓勇；无畏则无勇。
author: Eddie Rickenbacker

txt_en: All great achievements require time.
txt_cn: 所有伟大的成就都需要时间的历练。
author: Maya Angelou

txt_en: We go where our vision is.
txt_cn: 我们的视野有多远，就能走多远。
author: Joseph Murphy

txt_en: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
txt_cn: 工作中最重要的部分是开始阶段。
author: Plato

txt_en: Dripping water hollows out stone, not through force but through persistence.
txt_cn: 水滴石穿非力之所能为，乃能持之以恒也。
author: Ovid

txt_en: If you do not believe you can do it, then you have no chance at all.
txt_cn: 如果你不相信自己能做到，你就永远没有机会做到。
author: Arsene Wenger

txt_en: Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim.
txt_cn: 成为人生的女主角，而不是受害者，这才是最重要的。
author: Nora Ephron

txt_en: Change, like healing, takes time.
txt_cn: 改变犹如伤口愈合，需要时间。
author: Veronica Roth

txt_en: It is easy to live for others, everybody does. I call on you to live for yourself.
txt_cn: 为他人而活很简单，每个人都可以做到。我号召你们为自己而活。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

txt_en: Keep your best wishes, close to your heart and watch what happens.
txt_cn: 一直怀揣着最美的愿望，倾听内心的声音，再看看会发生什么。
author: Tony DeLiso

txt_en: The creation of a thousand forests is in one acorn.
txt_cn: 上千森林的形成都源自一颗橡木种子。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

txt_en: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
txt_cn: 知识是倾诉，但智慧是倾听。
author: Jimi Hendrix

txt_en: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
txt_cn: 美，从你下决心做自己的那一刻开始。
author: Coco Chanel

txt_en: I believe the target of anything in life should be to do it so well that it becomes an art.
txt_cn: 我认为，在生活中，不管做任何事，其目标都应该是将它做到艺术一般完美。
author: Arsene Wenger

txt_en: Spring is nature's way of saying, "Let's party!"
txt_cn: 春天的到来是大自然在说：“来狂欢吧！”
author: Robin Williams

txt_en: The beautiful journey of today can only begin when we learn to let go of yesterday.
txt_cn: 学会放过昨天，才能开启明天的美好旅程。
author: Steve Maraboli

txt_en: Real change, enduring change, happens one step at a time.
txt_cn: 真正的改变，持久的变化，都是一步一步完成的。
author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

txt_en: I think part of my gift, or if I have one, is that I love listening.
txt_cn: 我觉得我的天赋——如果我有天赋的话——就是我热爱倾听。
author: Eric Clapton

txt_en: There is no time like Spring, when life's alive in everything.
txt_cn: 再没有什么时节像春天一样，万物复苏，充满生机。
author: Christina Rossetti

txt_en: Sometimes if you want to see a change for the better, you have to take things into your own hands.
txt_cn: 有时当你想看到自己变得更好的时候，你就必须自己动手付出努力。
author: Clint Eastwoods
